home.title:
Smart
greenhouses
home.subtitle: Grow your garden smarter with our Smart Greenhouses. Packed with clever tech to keep your plants happy, our greenhouses make it easy to maintain the perfect environment. Your greens will be healthier, and you'll have more time to relax and enjoy. It's all about getting the best from nature, effortlessly. Welcome to your garden's bright future!

cards.title: Light
cards.description: Set up a flexible lighting schedule suitable for each growth stage of the plant.

cards.title: Ventilation
cards.description: Control the temperature and humidity of the air, as well as the operation of all fans and exhausts.

cards.title: CO2 Levels
cards.description: Provide plants with the necessary CO2 with our gas concentration control system.

cards.title: Soil
cards.description: Monitor soil condition with pH, NPK, and temperature sensors.

cards.title: Watering and Water Treatment
cards.description: Prepare water using a system for measuring temperature, pH, and TDS, and set up a convenient watering schedule.

cards.title: Internet Connection and Video Surveillance
cards.description: Manage the greenhouse, receive information, and monitor plants in real-time.
